Package fi.tuni.tiko

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
fi.tuni.tiko.Screen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChoiceScreen, MainMenuScreen
public abstract class Screen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage
Screen is an abstract class that is used to create different screen layouts for the game. Every screen has a screen ID, some choices that can move the game to a different screen and a group that houses all it's elements.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Screen

      public Screen​(int screenID, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> choices, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> screenLinks)
      Creates a new screen. The basic constructor. All parameters need to be specified.
      Parameters:
      screenID - a unique integer used in MainGame to determine which screen to show
      choices - text for each of the choices
      screenLinks - list of screen IDs for screens the choices lead to. Must be the same size as choices

    • Screen

      public Screen()
      Creates a screen with the specification of the main menu. Used in the construction of the MainMenuScreen class.

  • Method Details

    • createMainMenuAnswers

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createMainMenuAnswers()
      Returns the choices of the main menu. Used for constructing the main menu.
      Returns:
      a list of choices on the main menu

    • createMainMenuScreenLinks

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> createMainMenuScreenLinks()
      Returns the IDs for the choices for the main menu. The MainMenuScreen class will determine what to do based on these numbers. Used for constructing the main menu.
      Returns:
      a list of IDs for the main menu choices

      Parameters:
